Text: ...M-Mitsuki-san! Cảm ơn cô đã luôn quan tâm đến bà ngoại tôi!
...Q-Quan tâm đến bà ngoại cô...? Tôi...?
Vâng! Bà ngoại kể với tôi qua điện thoại. Rằng Mitsuki-san nhà bên cạnh luôn lo lắng cho bà sống một mình, nên bà giả vờ có khiếu nại chỉ để đến thăm.
Bà ngoại lúc nào cũng nói về cô với niềm vui thích! Bà ấy vui mừng đến mức cô như là một đứa cháu gái thứ hai vậy, Mitsuki-san!
Chính vì vậy... tôi đã muốn gặp cô từ lâu lắm rồi, Mitsuki-san! Để tôi cũng có thể cảm ơn cô vì tất cả những gì cô đã làm!
Thật sự...! Cảm ơn cô rất nhiều!
Đó là... có lẽ cô đã hiểu nhầm điều gì đó, tôi nghĩ vậy. Thôi, tôi còn việc phải làm.
...Hẹn gặp lại.
Vâng! Gặp lại sau!
Và thế là, đây là câu chuyện đằng sau mối liên hệ định mệnh giữa Mitsuki và Bà Tera. Và rồi, cuộc gặp gỡ của cô ấy với Mari. ...Có lẽ họ thực sự cũng như vậy trong kiếp trước.
Không, chắc chắn rồi.
Wanted Woman, Louise Marie
Another Genius Alchemist
17 Year Old Grandmother
Iroha's Oedo Travelogue
A Comrade Who Shook My Heart Anew
Alces and Twilight!
Mixed “Ultimate Transmutation”!
The Back-alley Doctor & The Alchemist
About 10 years ago in a certain town -- a girl with deer antlers and an old woman were standing in front of an alchemy pot.
"Original Transmutation"!
...Aha♪ I've done it! I did it, Grandma!
My, that's amazing, Rui-chan! I can't believe your first attempt at alchemy was successful!
Wait, WHAT?! That’s a... Rank 15 Transmutation—a Golden Pendant! Even seasoned alchemists can’t make that easily!
Hehe, hey, Grandma? I wonder if I can become an alchemist just like you?
Hehe, of course you can. I guarantee it. After all, Rui-chan, you’re even more of a genius than I am!
...Wasn’t it obvious?
...Mnyah. Hehe... That’s right, I’m a genius. The genius alchemist, Lady Louise Marie... Mnyah...
Uwah... even in her dreams, her self-confidence is sky-high. Rui-chan doesn’t seem stressed at all—her sleep must be amazing.
Actually, she hasn't woken up at all for a while now. Yet she asked me to wake her up because she had something important to do today.
Heeeey, Iroha. Don't just rummage under Rui-chan's bed. Help me wake her up instead...
Okaaaay, leave it to Iroha! Then here I go! Ready and...
Daaance in the... FRAGRANCEEEEE♪♪
...Ehehehe, I’m such a... genius. Mnyah...
Mmm, she’s not waking up. Guess Iroha has no choice but to unleash it... Iroha's best move!! ...So with that said.
HORNY DEATH GRIP--GO!!
EEEEK!?
Rui-chan! Good morning!
Wha-... I-Iroha-chan?! Don't I always tell you not to grip on my antlers...! I’m super sensitive there... It makes me all tingly... haauugh...
For someone claiming it’s her weak spot, you sure sound a little too happy about it. ...Rui-chan. Please spare me this R-18 show so early in the morning. It’s bad for Iroha's education.
Why am I getting scolded here?! ...Wait, I’m not happy about anything!
Nngh... s-shiver shiver shiver... Get off of me already, you ruffian girl!
Man, you're making me blush~♪
That was NOT a praise!
Glad to see you're energetic today too. Anyway, Rui-chan, you sure you can waste time?
Huuuh? Why, what time is it... Ahh!? It's already this late!!
Today is the best day of my life, the day I've ever dreamed of... MY FIRST DATE WITH {playername}-KUUUUUUUUUN!!!!!
No, all you two are doing is shopping for alchemic ingredients, right? Well, I guess it's fine... Hehe.
Canteen, check. Wallet, check. Gummy bears, check. Chocolate, check. Acorns, check. A handkerchief, tissues, bandages... All that's left, is a bug net and an insect cage!! FINISH!!
Hey, Iroha. Sorry to burst your bubble while you're so eager to get out and about, but you're staying home with me.
